articles.title: Bitcoin drops below US$30000 as relentless China crackdown weighs - CNA
articles.description: Bitcoin stabilised in Asian trading on Tuesday morning a day after a statement from China's central bank reaffirming the ongoing crackdown on cryptocurrencies in the country sent the world's largest token to a two-week low.
articles.content: NEW YORK/LONDON/HONG KONG: Bitcoin on Tuesday fell below US$30,000 for the first time since January, briefly erasing gains for the year and adding to losses sparked a day earlier when China's central… [+3890 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccines do not increase risk of miscarriage, foetal anomaly: KKH doctor cites study in response to letter - AsiaOne
